education_text.0: Rosenfeld was a leading researcher in the field of      redirect    Computer image analysis computer image analysisRosenfeld's research on digital image analysis (specifically on      Digital geometry digital geometry and      Digital topology digital topology, and on the accurate measurement of statistical features of      redirect    Digital images digital images) in the 1960s and 1970s formed the foundation for a generation of industrial vision inspection systems that have found widespread applications from the automotive to the electronics industry
